players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed last night. We need to find the mafia quickly before more town members are lost."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Diana is the mafia."
Bob: "We must vote for Diana to secure the town's victory."
You: "I agree with Bob. Diana is the mafia and we should vote her out immediately."
Diana: "Bob and Alice are ganging up on me with no proof. Why would Bob accuse me so quickly? I think one of you is trying to frame me to cover your own role."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed last night. We need to find the mafia quickly before more town members are lost."
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Diana is the mafia."
You: "We must vote for Diana to secure the town's victory."
Alice: "I agree with Bob. Diana is the mafia and we should vote her out immediately."
Diana: "Bob and Alice are ganging up on me with no proof. Why would Bob accuse me so quickly? I think one of you is trying to frame me to cover your own role."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was killed last night. We need to find the mafia quickly before more town members are lost."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Diana is the mafia."
Bob: "We must vote for Diana to secure the town's victory."
Alice: "I agree with Bob. Diana is the mafia and we should vote her out immediately."
You: "Bob and Alice are ganging up on me with no proof. Why would Bob accuse me so quickly? I think one of you is trying to frame me to cover your own role."
